metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34059 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
open-vm-tools contains a file descriptor hijack vulnerability in thevmware-user-suid-wrapper. A malicious actor with non-root privileges may beable to hijack the /dev/uinput file descriptor allowing them to simulateuser inputs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34059` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

open-vm-tools - 2:11.3.0-2ubuntu0~ubuntu20.04.7
open-vm-tools-desktop - 2:11.3.0-2ubuntu0~ubuntu20.04.7
open-vm-tools-sdmp - 2:11.3.0-2ubuntu0~ubuntu20.04.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:11.3.0-2ubuntu0~ubuntu20.04.7').
